description: Returns a paginated list of common controls from the Amazon Web Services Control Catalog. You can apply an optional filter to see common controls that have a specific objective. If you don't provide a filter, the operation returns all common controls.

parameters.name: CommonControlFilter
parameters.description: An optional filter that narrows the results to a specific objective. This filter allows you to specify one objective ARN at a time. Passing multiple ARNs in the CommonControlFilter isn't currently supported. Objectives (list) --- The objective that's used as filter criteria. You can use this parameter to specify one objective ARN at a time. (dict) --- The objective resource that's being used as a filter. Arn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the objective.

nested_params.name: Objectives
nested_params.description: The objective that's used as filter criteria. You can use this parameter to specify one objective ARN at a time. Passing multiple ARNs in the CommonControlFilter isn't currently supported.

nested_params.name: Arn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the objective.

nested_items.name: CommonControls
nested_items.description: The list of common controls that the ListCommonControls API returns.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the common control.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the common control.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the common control.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the related domain.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the related domain.

nested_items.name: Objective
nested_items.description: The objective that the common control belongs to.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the related objective.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the related objective.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the common control was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the common control was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used to fetch the next set of results.
